category.name: an addon name
category.path: an addon path, relative for .dll, absolute for .exe
category.update: [true, fale] Whether the addon should be updated when the manager run the game
category.enabled: [true, false] Whether the addon is enabled at all (will not be chainloaded or run)

available_categories: Can be specified both but only one will be used for defining the chainload. Default is dx9, use -dx11 in the program arguments to use dx11
.dlls not depending on dx9 or dx11 (ex.: ReShade)
